verses.verse: And all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> their voice, <WH6963> and cried; <WH5414> and the people <WH5971> wept <WH1058> that <WH1931> night. <WH3915>

And all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron: <WH175> and the whole <WH3605> congregation <WH5712> said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Would God that <WH3863> we had died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Egypt! <WH4714> or <WH176> would God <WH3863> we had died <WH4191> in this <WH2088> wilderness! <WH4057>

And wherefore <WH4100> hath the LORD <WH3068> brought <WH935> us unto <WH413> this <WH2063> land, <WH776> to fall <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> that our wives <WH802> and our children <WH2945> should be <WH1961> a prey? <WH957> were it not <WH3808> better <WH2896> for us to return <WH7725> into Egypt? <WH4714>
And they said <WH559> one <WH376> to <WH413> another, <WH251> Let us make <WH5414> a captain, <WH7218> and let us return <WH7725> into Egypt. <WH4714>

Then Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> their faces <WH6440> before <WH6440> all <WH3605> the assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh, <WH3312> which were of <WH4480> them that searched <WH8446> <WH853> the land, <WH776> rent <WH7167> their clothes: <WH899>

And they spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> the company <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> The land, <WH776> which <WH834> we passed through <WH5674> to search <WH8446> it, is an exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> good <WH2896> land. <WH776>

If <WH518> the LORD <WH3068> delight <WH2654> in us, then he will bring <WH935> us into <WH413> this <WH2063> land, <WH776> and give <WH5414> it us; a land <WH776> which <WH834> floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>

Only <WH389> rebel <WH4775> not <WH408> ye against the LORD, <WH3068> neither <WH408> fear <WH3372> ye <WH859> <WH853> the people <WH5971> of the land; <WH776> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are bread <WH3899> for us: their defense <WH6738> is departed <WH5493> from <WH4480> <WH5921> them, and the LORD <WH3068> is with <WH854> us: fear <WH3372> them not. <WH408>

But all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> bade <WH559> stone <WH7275> them with stones. <WH68> And the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH413> all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> How long <WH5704> <WH575> will this <WH2088> people <WH5971> provoke <WH5006> me? and how long <WH5704> <WH575> will it be ere <WH3808> they believe <WH539> me, for all <WH3605> the signs <WH226> which <WH834> I have showed <WH6213> among <WH7130> them?
I will smite <WH5221> them with the pestilence, <WH1698> and disinherit <WH3423> them, and will make <WH6213> of thee a greater <WH1419> nation <WH1471> and mightier <WH6099> than <WH4480> they.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> Then the Egyptians <WH4714> shall hear <WH8085> it, (for <WH3588> thou broughtest up <WH5927> <WH853> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> in thy might <WH3581> from among <WH4480> <WH7130> them;)

And they will tell <WH559> it to <WH413> the inhabitants <WH3427> of this <WH2063> land: <WH776> for they have heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> thou <WH859> LORD <WH3068> art among <WH7130> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> that <WH834> thou <WH859> LORD <WH3068> art seen <WH7200> face <WH5869> to face, <WH5869> and that thy cloud <WH6051> standeth <WH5975> over <WH5921> them, and that thou <WH859> goest <WH1980> before <WH6440> them, by day time <WH3119> in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud, <WH6051> and in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night. <WH3915>

Now if thou shalt kill <WH4191> all <WH853> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> as one <WH259> man, <WH376> then the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> have heard <WH8085> <WH853> the fame <WH8088> of thee will speak, <WH559> saying, <WH559>

Because <WH4480> <WH1115> the LORD <WH3068> was not able <WH3201> to bring <WH935> <WH853> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> unto them therefore he hath slain <WH7819> them in the wilderness. <WH4057>
And now, <WH6258> I beseech thee, <WH4994> let the power <WH3581> of my Lord <WH136> be great, <WH1431> according as <WH834> thou hast spoken, <WH1696> saying, <WH559>

The LORD <WH3068> is longsuffering, <WH750> <WH639> and of great <WH7227> mercy, <WH2617> forgiving <WH5375> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression, <WH6588> and by no means clearing <WH5352> <WH5352> <WH3808> the guilty, visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon <WH5921> the children <WH1121> unto <WH5921> the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation.

Pardon, <WH5545> I beseech thee, <WH4994> the iniquity <WH5771> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> according unto the greatness <WH1433> of thy mercy, <WH2617> and as <WH834> thou hast forgiven <WH5375> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> from Egypt <WH4480> <WH4714> even until <WH5704> now. <WH2008>
And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> I have pardoned <WH5545> according to thy word: <WH1697>
But as truly <WH199> as I <WH589> live, <WH2416> <WH853> all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> shall be filled <WH4390> with the glory <WH3519> of the LORD. <WH3068>

Because <WH3588> all <WH3605> those men <WH376> which have seen <WH7200> <WH853> my glory, <WH3519> and my miracles, <WH226> which <WH834> I did <WH6213> in Egypt <WH4714> and in the wilderness, <WH4057> and have tempted <WH5254> me now these <WH2088> ten <WH6235> times, <WH6471> and have not <WH3808> hearkened <WH8085> to my voice; <WH6963>

Surely <WH518> they shall not see <WH7200> <WH853> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> unto their fathers, <WH1> neither <WH3808> shall any <WH3605> of them that provoked <WH5006> me see <WH7200> it:

But my servant <WH5650> Caleb, <WH3612> because <WH6118> he had <WH1961> another <WH312> spirit <WH7307> with <WH5973> him, and hath followed me fully, <WH4390> <WH310> him will I bring <WH935> into <WH413> the land <WH776> whereinto <WH834> <WH8033> he went; <WH935> and his seed <WH2233> shall possess <WH3423> it.

(Now the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> in the valley.) <WH6010> Tomorrow <WH4279> turn <WH6437> you, and get <WH5265> you into the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea. <WH3220>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses <WH4872> and unto <WH413> Aaron <WH175> saying, <WH559>

How long <WH5704> <WH4970> shall I bear with this <WH2063> evil <WH7451> congregation, <WH5712> which <WH834> murmur <WH3885> against <WH5921> me? I have heard <WH8085> <WH853> the murmurings <WH8519> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> they <WH1992> murmur <WH3885> against <WH5921> me.
Say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, As truly as I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> as <WH834> ye have spoken <WH1696> in mine ears, <WH241> so <WH3651> will I do <WH6213> to you:

Your carcasses <WH6297> shall fall <WH5307> in this <WH2088> wilderness; <WH4057> and all <WH3605> that were numbered <WH6485> of you, according to your whole <WH3605> number, <WH4557> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH4480> <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> which <WH834> have murmured <WH3885> against <WH5921> me,

Doubtless <WH518> ye <WH859> shall not come <WH935> into <WH413> the land, <WH776> concerning which <WH834> I swore <WH5375> <WH853> <WH3027> to make you dwell <WH7931> therein, save <WH3588> <WH518> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh, <WH3312> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>

But your little ones, <WH2945> which <WH834> ye said <WH559> should be <WH1961> a prey, <WH957> them will I bring in, <WH935> and they shall know <WH3045> <WH853> the land <WH776> which <WH834> ye have despised. <WH3988>
But as for you, <WH859> your carcasses, <WH6297> they shall fall <WH5307> in this <WH2088> wilderness. <WH4057>

And your children <WH1121> shall wander <WH1961> <WH7462> in the wilderness <WH4057> forty <WH705> years, <WH8141> and bear <WH5375> <WH853> your whoredoms, <WH2184> until <WH5704> your carcasses <WH6297> be wasted <WH8552> in the wilderness. <WH4057>

After the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> in which <WH834> ye searched <WH8446> <WH853> the land, <WH776> even forty <WH705> days, <WH3117> each day for a year, <WH3117> <WH8141> <WH3117> <WH8141> shall ye bear <WH5375> <WH853> your iniquities, <WH5771> even forty <WH705> years, <WH8141> and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH853> my breach of promise. <WH8569>

I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have said, <WH1696> I will surely <WH518> <WH3808> do <WH6213> it <WH2063> unto all <WH3605> this <WH2063> evil <WH7451> congregation, <WH5712> that are gathered together <WH3259> against <WH5921> me: in this <WH2088> wilderness <WH4057> they shall be consumed, <WH8552> and there <WH8033> they shall die. <WH4191>

And the men, <WH376> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to search <WH8446> <WH853> the land, <WH776> who returned, <WH7725> and made <WH853> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> to murmur <WH3885> against <WH5921> him, by bringing up <WH3318> a slander <WH1681> upon <WH5921> the land, <WH776>
Even those men <WH376> that did bring up <WH3318> the evil <WH7451> report <WH1681> upon the land, <WH776> died <WH4191> by the plague <WH4046> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

But Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh, <WH3312> which were of <WH4480> the men <WH376> that went <WH1980> to search <WH8446> <WH853> the land, <WH776> lived <WH2421> still.
And Moses <WH4872> told <WH1696> <WH853> these <WH428> sayings <WH1697> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and the people <WH5971> mourned <WH56> greatly. <WH3966>

And they rose up early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and got them up <WH5927> into <WH413> the top <WH7218> of the mountain, <WH2022> saying, <WH559> Lo, <WH2009> we be here, and will go up <WH5927> unto <WH413> the place <WH4725> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath promised: <WH559> for <WH3588> we have sinned. <WH2398>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> Wherefore <WH4100> now <WH2088> do ye <WH859> transgress <WH5674> <WH853> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD? <WH3068> but it <WH1931> shall not <WH3808> prosper. <WH6743>
Go not up, <WH5927> <WH408> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> is not <WH369> among <WH7130> you; that ye be not <WH3808> smitten <WH5062> before <WH6440> your enemies. <WH341>

For <WH3588> the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> are there <WH8033> before <WH6440> you, and ye shall fall <WH5307> by the sword: <WH2719> because <WH3588> <WH5921> <WH3651> ye are turned away <WH7725> from <WH4480> <WH310> the LORD, <WH3068> therefore the LORD <WH3068> will not <WH3808> be <WH1961> with <WH5973> you.

But they presumed <WH6075> to go up <WH5927> unto <WH413> the hill <WH2022> top: <WH7218> nevertheless the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD, <WH3068> and Moses, <WH4872> departed <WH4185> not <WH3808> out of <WH4480> <WH7130> the camp. <WH4264>

Then the Amalekites <WH6003> came down, <WH3381> and the Canaanites <WH3669> which dwelt <WH3427> in that <WH1931> hill, <WH2022> and smote <WH5221> them, and discomfited <WH3807> them, even unto <WH5704> Hormah. <WH2767>
